thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 05 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Karmin Engages Financial Advisor To Review Strategic Alternatives

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Karmin Engages Financial Advisor To Review Strategic Alternatives
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Karmin Exploration Inc:
* KARMIN ENGAGES FINANCIAL ADVISOR TO REVIEW STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES
* ‍UNDERTAKING REVIEW OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES WITH RESPECT TO ITS 30% CARRIED INTEREST IN ARIPUANÃ ZINC LEAD COPPER SILVER PROJECT​
* ‍IN CONNECTION WITH STRATEGIC REVIEW CO HAS ENGAGED CIBC WORLD MARKETS INC. TO ACT AS ITS EXCLUSIVE FINANCIAL ADVISOR​
* STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES UNDER CONSIDERATION WILL INCLUDE FINANCING ALTERNATIVES FOR ITS PARTICIPATION IN DEVELOPMENT OF ARIPUANÃ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
